plot: Ten men from the Isle of Lewis in Scotland set sail for Sula Sgeir, a desolate island in the Atlantic Ocean. Following in the footsteps of their ancestors, they journey through storms to hunt gannets, a prized delicacy in Ness.
title: The Guga Hunters of Ness
plot_es: Ten men from the Isle of Lewis in Scotland set sail for Sula Sgeir, a desolate island in the Atlantic Ocean. Following in the footsteps of their ancestors, they journey through storms to hunt gannets, a prized delicacy in Ness.
plot_en: Ten men from the Isle of Lewis in Scotland set sail for Sula Sgeir, a desolate island in the Atlantic Ocean. Following in the footsteps of their ancestors, they journey through storms to hunt gannets, a prized delicacy in Ness.
